summary: A young female agent with a powerful psionic power over paper must stop a plot for world destruction.
cast: Rieko Miura|Michiko Neya|Ryan Abraham|Raymond Braun|Brooke Cadorette|Sue Cremin|Chad Fifer|Crispin Freeman|Hozumi Gôda|Dean Haglund|Adam Harrington|Dave Herbelin|Daisuke Ishikawa|Katashi Ishizuka|Masami Iwasaki|Shôji Izumi|Jody Jaress|Harî Kaneko|Hidenobu Kiuchi|Konta|Jason Lee|Hal Lublin|Scott MacDonell|Jason Charles Miller|Yoshikazu Nagano|Yûki Nakao|Robert J. Peterson|Daniel Raymont|Michael Ross|Douglas Rye|Mika Sakenobe|Samantha Tabak|Hiroki Takahashi|Eiji Takemoto|Junko Takeuchi|Bunmei Tobayama|Amanda Winn Lee|Kimberly Yates|Ryôsuke Ôtani
title: Read or Die
